title: Suggestion for SliceTricks wiki
body:
by **everton.marques**: 
Suggestion for wiki:

    SliceTricks - How to do vector-esque things with slices. 
    https://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/SliceTricks

Replace at the end of page, this:

    Pop
    x, a = a[len(a)-1], a[:len(a)-1]

With this:

    Pop from queue
    x, a = a[0], a[1:]

    Pop from stack
    x, a = a[len(a)-1], a[:len(a)-1]
